title: Number of Crunchyroll subscribers 2012 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in thousands in the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The highest Month November 2018 has 1900.0 more Number of users in thousands than the lowest Month September 2012.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
The maximum Number of users in thousands 2000.0 is found at Month November 2018 and the minimum is found at September 2012 where Month is 100.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in thousands in the y axis.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The highest Month November 2018 has 1900.0 more Number of users in thousands than the lowest Month September 2012.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
The maximum Number of users in thousands 2000.0 is found at Month November 2018 and the minimum is found at September 2012 where Month is 100.0.
The second highest Number of users in thousands is appeared to be the Month February 2017.
The difference of Number of users in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 1900.0.
Month November 2018 is higher than any other Months with value 2000.0, followed by February 2017, and November 2015. Down to Month September 2012 with the lowest value 100.0.
Overall Number of users in thousands has declined over the Months.
The Month September 2012 tends to be 2.7 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 4450.0.
